subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Volvo Ocean Race
lead_paragraph: The third leg of the Volvo Ocean Race started Saturday with the fleet setting sail for China without the Danish-backed Team Vestas Wind, whose vessel was being assessed for repairs.
snippet: The third leg of the Volvo Ocean Race started Saturday with the fleet setting sail for China without the Danish-backed Team Vestas Wind, whose vessel was being assessed for repairs.
